title: Racing Team with Vehicle
description: Our team with our latest racing car at the National Championship. The culmination of months of hard work and dedication from every team member.

title: Car on Racetrack
description: Testing day at the local circuit - pushing our car to the limits. Our drivers gather valuable data to improve performance.

title: Engine Workshop
description: Our engineering team fine-tuning the engine for maximum performance. Every horsepower counts when you're competing at the highest level.

title: Team Celebration
description: Celebrating our podium finish at the Regional Finals. A testament to our team's perseverance and racing excellence.
